name: 123 Soleil!
description:
!! This game must be played with sound !!

123 Soleil! is a short game we made together with my kids for the Ludum Dare competition with the theme "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres". 

We decided to mix a the Platform Game genre (a video game genre) with the Statues genre (a real life kid game genre). As we are french speaking we chose to use the 1-2-3 Soleil! variant of statues.

Controls:

  • left/right arrow keys: move
  • space bar: jump
